about_the_game:
Overview:

Enjoy a colorful puzzle-platformer experience in Color Phase! Find and use different colors to interact with the world around you in a variety of different ways to reach your goal!

Features:

  • Explore 20+ levels solving puzzles and completing dexterous challenges
  • Utilize four (4) colors each with their own attributes and special ability
  • There is a grappling hook
  • This game will not hurt you

About us:

Developed by Heatwave Studio (formerly 25PercentGames), a student game development group based out of Arizona State University that aims to complete and publish one game each year. The game is a completely volunteer effort from an interdisciplinary team of students from across the academic and creative spectrum. We hope you enjoy what we made!

Gameplay:

Solve puzzles!


Navigate platforming challenges!!


I already said there's a grapple hook!!!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12.6+
  • Processor: i5 and Above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or better
  • Storage: 69 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you're into that sort of thing
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: i5 and Above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or better
  • Storage: 69 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes

name: Color Phase

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: i5 and Above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 69 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you're into that sort of thing
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: i5 and Above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 69 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes

short_description: Experience a colorful puzzle-platformer experience in Color Phase! Find and use different colors to interact with the world around you in a variety of different ways to reach your goal!
